name: Sia Metadata File
summary: A SIA file is a metadata file used by Sia, a decentralized cloud storage network that utilizes blockchain technology. It contains metadata about one or more files that have been uploaded to the Sia network, which includes an encryption key and the locations of the hosts that are storing the uploaded files. SIA files allow users to share files that they have uploaded to the network with other users.
